meanings.definition: A seminar conducted over the internet.
meanings.sent1: I attended a webinar on gardening tips last night.
meanings.sent2: The webinar on cybersecurity was informative.
meanings.sent3: The webinar about cat behavior made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her webinar on time management was a lifesaver.
meanings.sent5: The webinar on healthy cooking was so engaging.

meanings.definition: A presentation, lecture, workshop, or seminar that is transmitted over the Web using video conferencing software.
meanings.sent1: The company hosted a webinar to introduce the new product.
meanings.sent2: I find webinars to be a convenient way to learn new skills.
meanings.sent3: The webinar on penguin fashion was surprisingly interesting.
meanings.sent4: His webinar on leadership was like a beacon of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: Attending the webinar on space exploration was eye-opening.
